Package org.neo4j.counts

Interface CountsAccessor.Updater

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CountsDelta, CountsRecordState, CountUpdater
    Enclosing interface:
    CountsAccessor
    public static interface CountsAccessor.Updater
extends AutoCloseable
    Updater of counts. Matches CountsAccessor and has the writing equivalence of those methods.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void close()
      Closes this updater and ensures that counts are applied as well as no more deltas can be applied after closed.
      void incrementNodeCount​(long labelId, long delta)
      Increments (or decrements if delta is negative) the count for the node label token id.
      void incrementRelationshipCount​(long startLabelId, int typeId, long endLabelId, long delta)
      Increments (or decrements if delta is negative) the count for the combination of the start/end labels and relationship type.

    • Method Detail

      • incrementNodeCount

        void incrementNodeCount​(long labelId,
                        long delta)
        Increments (or decrements if delta is negative) the count for the node label token id.
        Parameters:
        labelId - node label token id.
        delta - delta (positive or negative) to apply for the label.

      • incrementRelationshipCount

        void incrementRelationshipCount​(long startLabelId,
                                int typeId,
                                long endLabelId,
                                long delta)
        Increments (or decrements if delta is negative) the count for the combination of the start/end labels and relationship type.
        Parameters:
        startLabelId - node label token id of start node of relationship.
        typeId - relationship type token id of relationship.
        endLabelId - node label token id of end node of relationship.
        delta - delta (positive or negative) to apply for the label.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes this updater and ensures that counts are applied as well as no more deltas can be applied after closed.
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
